name: Trouble Builder
description:
It's an arcade/roguelike game where you'll have to create your own path with the use of tetris blocks. During the game, you'll unlock various powers (some useful, others with negative curses and even extremely mad ones) you will be able to bestow to the different blocks.

Create your own path, avoid enemies and place your powered up blocks

W,A,S,D for movement

Left Click to place Block

Right Click to rotate Block

Place a Block on enemies to kill them

Game Designers: Gabriele Maramai, Marco Trentacosti

Game Programmer: Emanuel Randazzo,  Edoardo del Sarto, Marco Trentacosti

Game Artist: Veronica Loiotile
